preferences.description: App preferences for this user. Null if the user has never saved preferences.

foodPreferences.description: Free-text dietary preferences, e.g. "vegetarian, no shellfish". Send null to clear.

allergies.description: Free-text allergy list, e.g. "nuts, gluten, dairy". Send null to clear.

defaultEquipment.description: List of equipment item names the user typically brings. Send null to clear.

get.description: Check if the server and database are healthy

post.description: Deprecated: Use POST /plans/with-owner instead. Creates a plan without an owner participant.

get.description: Retrieve all plans ordered by creation date

post.summary: [NEW] Create a plan with owner participant
post.description: Creates a plan and its owner participant in a single transaction. Returns the plan with participants[] and items[]. Replaces POST /plans for new FE integration.

get.summary: Get plan by ID (now includes participants)
get.description: Retrieve a single plan by its ID with associated items and participants. Response now includes participants[] array alongside items[].

patch.description: Update an existing plan by its ID

delete.description: Delete a plan by its ID. Requires JWT. Admin can delete any plan; owner can delete their own. Cascade delete handles related items, participants, and assignments.

get.summary: List all participants for a plan
get.description: Retrieve all participants belonging to a specific plan

post.summary: [UPDATED] Add a participant to a plan
post.description: Create a new participant in the specified plan. Required fields changed: now requires name, lastName, contactPhone instead of displayName.

get.description: Retrieve a single participant by its ID

patch.description: Update an existing participant by its ID

delete.description: Delete a participant by its ID. Items assigned to this participant will have their assignment cleared.

post.summary: Add an item to a plan
post.description: Create a new item in the specified plan. Equipment items always use pcs as the unit. Food items require a unit.

get.summary: List all items for a plan
get.description: Retrieve all items belonging to a specific plan

patch.description: Update an existing item by its ID

get.summary: Access a plan via invite link
get.description: Public endpoint. Validates the invite token and returns plan data with items. Participant PII is stripped  only displayName and role are included.

post.summary: Regenerate invite token for a participant
post.description: Generates a new invite token for the specified participant, invalidating the previous one. Requires API key (owner action).

get.description: Returns the authenticated user identity extracted from the JWT. Returns 401 if no valid JWT is provided.
Returns user identity from JWT and app preferences from the database. Returns 401 if no valid JWT is provided.

patch.description: Creates or updates the authenticated user's app preferences. Returns 401 if no valid JWT is provided.

post.summary: Claim a participant spot via invite token
post.description: Links an authenticated user (JWT) to an existing participant record identified by the invite token. After claiming, the user can access the plan via JWT without the invite token.
